big_projects.heading: IDEP branding, logo and UI/UX design and website development.
big_projects.paragraph: We worked with IDEP on creating the future platform that will push the next generation of NFT tokens and the crypto market.

big_projects.heading: Liquid ICP website and branding.
big_projects.paragraph: Liquid ICP is world's first s-Bridge where bridged and staked assets remain liquid. Fractional reserve is governed by Liquid ICP community and ensures immediate withdrawal of ICP coins at any given time.

small_projects.heading: Archil Snow logo|brand|UI/UX design and website development.
